tutorial.title: Sections Using Named Areas
tutorial.descriptionContent: Use named areas to create a webpage with different sections.

lessons.title: Intro
lessons.interactiveContent: We can use grid to create different webpage sections like the one shown below. Let's learn how to use named areas to create such sections.

lessons.title: Sections
lessons.interactiveContent:
The first step to creating sections is giving grid items descriptive class names.

Give a class name to the element that contains the main content of the webpage.

Make sure to pick main.

lessons.title: Grid names
lessons.interactiveContent:
To name grid items, we code the grid-area property inside each item CSS rule and assign the appropriate area names.

Set grid-area name to main.

Make sure to pick grid-area, followed by main.

lessons.title: Question
lessons.interactiveContent:
Let's take another look at the layout we want to create. How do you think we could implement this design?

By splitting the webpage into two columnsWe can do this with one column only

By splitting the webpage into two columns.

lessons.title: Sidebar
lessons.interactiveContent:
Now that we have named areas, we can create sections just by splitting up content into columns and rows.

Set grid-template-areas to "sidebar main".

Make sure to pick grid-template-areas followed by " and then sidebar, main, ".

lessons.title: Question II
lessons.interactiveContent:
Although the middle part is split into columns, the header and footer span across the entire width of the page. How would we achieve that?

By spanning those named areas across all the columnsBy spanning those named areas across all the rows

By spanning those named areas across all the columns.

lessons.title: Header
lessons.interactiveContent:
To make the header span across the width of the entire page, we just set grid-template-areas to "header header".

Make sure to pick " followed by header and then header, ".

lessons.title: Footer
lessons.interactiveContent:
If we want to create a footer section, we add the footer grid name twice to take up the entire last row.

Make sure to pick " followed by footer and then footer, ".

lessons.title: More complex example
lessons.interactiveContent:
We've covered a very basic website layout, but CSS Grid can be used to make far more powerful designs depending on our needs.

Make sure to pick "sidebar photo photo button".

lessons.title: Question: Grid names
lessons.interactiveContent:
What happens when we use the property in the following code?

We give the name header to the grid itemWe give the class name header to the grid item

We give the name header to the grid item.

lessons.title: Question: Header
lessons.interactiveContent:
What does this code display?

A header section spanning three columns A header section spanning three rows

A header section spanning three columns .

lessons.title: Question: Sidebar
lessons.interactiveContent:
How will the "sidebar" value display as a section in the following code?

As one column in the second rowAs two columns in the second row

As one column in the second row.

lessons.title: Question: Content
lessons.interactiveContent:
Which grid-template-areas value creates the middle row of this grid?

"sidebar sidebar content""sidebar content content"

"sidebar sidebar content".

lessons.title: Question: Footer
lessons.interactiveContent:
Which grid-template-areas value creates the footer section below?

"footer footer""footer footer footer"

"footer footer".

lessons.title: Example: Sections
lessons.interactiveContent:
Add the header and sidebar classes to the correct elements.

Make sure to pick header, followed by sidebar.

lessons.title: Example: Header
lessons.interactiveContent:
Set the grid-template-areas value to span the header section across three columns.

Make sure to pick header, followed by header, and finally header.

lessons.title: Example: Sidebar
lessons.interactiveContent:
Add a sidebar section to the right of the main content.

Make sure to type sidebar.

lessons.title: Example: Content
lessons.interactiveContent:
Make the sidebar area span over two rows.

Make sure to pick sidebar, followed by sidebar.

lessons.title: Example: Footer
lessons.interactiveContent:
Add the correct code such that the footer section spans the entire grid row.

Make sure to type footer footer.
